Development time:
2 months.
Stack:
Vue.js, jQuery, Django, Select2, Python.
Description:
A platform where users can see which companies around accept this or that cryptocurrency. Companies can be viewed both as a list and on a map. Also, the user can add his company through a special form on the site. We have developed the design of the project, as well as all the functionality.

Accepted_Here

  • #NFT
  • #Design
  • #Startups
Development time:
3 weeks
Stack:
React.js, Express.js, ImmutableX
Description:
Puzzle themed NFT project. The project has a lot of beautiful and smooth animations that improve the user experience while on the site. We used the Immutable X blockchain, popular among NFT projects, known for its extremely low gas price.

Development time:
2 months
Stack:
Angular, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js
Description:
A platform built for the US internet fax leader. The project uses a lot of modern technologies, such as SPA elements and complex server calculations. A customized administrative panel was created to control and add subscriptions/products.

3 weeks
Stack:
Wordpress, WooCommerce, PHP, MySQL
Description:
Website-showcase for Rauberg, a popular manufacturer of household appliances in Russia. The project used a lot of interesting animations, and also created and set up a purchase function directly on the site.

Rauberg

  • #Web
  • #eCommerce
  • #Front-end
Development time:
3 months
Stack:
Angular, TypeScript, d3.js, Node.js, Express.js
Description:
Service for creating customized maps of the starry sky. Here you can select the date, time and region of the starry sky to create a picture of the constellations that were above your head at that very moment. Even in our office there is a poster with a starry sky that was above us at the time of the creation of our company :)

Atlas Stars

  • #NFT
  • #Startups
  • #Front-end
Development time:
1 month
Stack:
React.js, Node.js, Solidity, web3.js
Description:
Lobsters themed NFT project. A one-page project with the possibility of NFT minting right on the site. Most of the proceeds from NFT sales go to ocean exploration and charities. The project was built on the popular Ethereum blockchain, where we used various techniques to reduce the cost of gas.

Loopy Lobsters

  • #DeFi
  • #Design
  • #Back-end
Development time:
2 months
Stack:
React.js, Next.js, Node.js, webpack
Description:
Decentralized store for selling 3D models, pictures and assets. The project uses SPA elements, a customized admin panel and an e-commerce service. The user can add products to the cart and pay directly on the site.

3dprint.hk

  • #DeFi
  • #Design
  • #Back-end
Development time:
1,5 months
Stack:
React.js, Next.js, Ether.js, web3.js
Description:
A one-page NFT project in which we used 3D images. In this project, we also designed and developed beautiful animations that add immersion and interaction to the site. The project was built on the Ethereum blockchain, for which we developed custom smart contracts to reduce the cost of gas.
